the edge until you reach the left-most edge of the work putting your last half_double_crochet by the last double_crochet of the shell on that side 2 chain 80 turn half_double_crochet in the second chain from the hook and in every stitch back to the body of the bandana 3 sl to attach the strap to the body and then single_crochet in every stitch across the bottom of the piece when you reach the other side sl up to the first half_double_crochet that you made for the edge 4 chain 80 turn half_double_crochet in the second chain from the hook and in every stitch back to the body bind off weave in ends with yarn needle or hook 3 finishing continued for a picot bobble border 1 chain 1 at the first double_crochet of the shell on the right-most corner *single_crochet in the next three stitches chain 3 then sl in the same stitch repeat from * until the left-most edge of the work placing single_crochet after the last bobble until you reach the last double_crochet of the shell on that side your last single_crochet should go by the last double_crochet of the shell on that side of the body see picture for reference 2 chain 80 turn half_double_crochet in the second chain from the hook and in every stitch back to the body of the bandana 3 sl to attach the strap to the body and then single_crochet in every stitch across the bottom of the piece when you reach the other side sl up to the
